trans-unit.source: Represents an object in JScript.
trans-unit.target: 表示 JScript 的物件。

trans-unit.source: This class belongs to the objects and functions category.
trans-unit.target: 這個類別屬於物件和函式分類。

trans-unit.source: Initializes a new instance of the <see cref="T:Microsoft.JScript.JSObject" /> class.
trans-unit.target: 初始化 <see cref="T:Microsoft.JScript.JSObject" /> 類別的新執行個體。

trans-unit.source: The name of the field to add.
trans-unit.target: 要加入的欄位名稱。

trans-unit.source: Adds the specified field to the object.
trans-unit.target: 將指定的欄位加入至物件中。

trans-unit.source: The new field, if it is successfully added.
trans-unit.target: 新欄位，如果已成功加入。

trans-unit.source: Stores a list of fields that are dynamically added and removed from the object.
trans-unit.target: 儲存動態加入至物件以及從物件移除之欄位的清單。

trans-unit.source: The name of the member to search for.
trans-unit.target: 要搜尋的成員名稱。

trans-unit.source: A bitwise combination of the enumeration values that specifies how the search for members is conducted by reflection.
trans-unit.target: 列舉值的位元組合，指定透過反映處理搜尋成員的方式。

trans-unit.source: Gets an array of <see cref="T:System.Reflection.MemberInfo" /> objects that correspond to all members that match the specified name.
trans-unit.target: 取得 <see cref="T:System.Reflection.MemberInfo" /> 物件的陣列，這些物件對應至所有符合指定之名稱的成員。

trans-unit.source: An array of members that match the <paramref name="name" /> argument.
trans-unit.target: 與 <paramref name="name" /> 引數相符的成員陣列。

trans-unit.source: A bitwise combination of the enumeration values that specifies how the search for members is conducted by reflection.
trans-unit.target: 列舉值的位元組合，指定透過反映處理搜尋成員的方式。

trans-unit.source: Gets an array of <see cref="T:System.Reflection.MemberInfo" /> objects that correspond to all members of the current script object.
trans-unit.target: 取得 <see cref="T:System.Reflection.MemberInfo" /> 物件陣列，這些物件對應於目前指令碼物件的所有成員。

trans-unit.source: An array of objects that contains all members of the current object.
trans-unit.target: 物件的陣列，包含目前物件的所有成員。

trans-unit.source: The name of the field for which to set the value.
trans-unit.target: 要設定其值的欄位名稱。

trans-unit.source: The new value of the field.
trans-unit.target: 欄位的新值。

trans-unit.source: Sets the value of a field that was dynamically added to the object and stored in <see cref="F:Microsoft.JScript.JSObject.field_table" />.
trans-unit.target: 為動態加入至物件並且儲存在 <see cref="F:Microsoft.JScript.JSObject.field_table" /> 中的欄位設定值。

trans-unit.source: Returns an enumerator that iterates through the members of the object.
trans-unit.target: 傳回可逐一查看物件成員的列舉值。

trans-unit.source: An enumerator object that is used to iterate through the members of the object.
trans-unit.target: 列舉值物件，用於逐一查看物件的成員。

trans-unit.source: The name of the method to add.
trans-unit.target: 要加入的方法名稱。

trans-unit.source: The delegate to the method.
trans-unit.target: 方法的委派。

trans-unit.source: Adds the specified method to the object.
trans-unit.target: 將指定的方法加入至物件中。

trans-unit.source: <see cref="M:Microsoft.JScript.JSObject.System#Runtime#InteropServices#Expando#IExpando#AddMethod(System.String,System.Delegate)" /> is not implemented in JScript.
trans-unit.target: JScript 中不會實作 <see cref="M:Microsoft.JScript.JSObject.System#Runtime#InteropServices#Expando#IExpando#AddMethod(System.String,System.Delegate)" />。

trans-unit.source: null in all cases.
trans-unit.target: 所有情況下都是 null。

trans-unit.source: The name of the property to add.
trans-unit.target: 要加入的屬性名稱。

trans-unit.source: Adds the specified property to the object.
trans-unit.target: 將指定的屬性加入至物件中。

trans-unit.source: This method is not implemented in JScript.
trans-unit.target: 這個方法並未在 JScript 中實作。

trans-unit.source: null in all cases.
trans-unit.target: 所有情況下都是 null。

trans-unit.source: The name of the member to remove.
trans-unit.target: 要移除之成員的名稱。

trans-unit.source: Removes the specified member from the object.
trans-unit.target: 從物件中移除指定的成員。

trans-unit.source: Returns a string that represents the current object.
trans-unit.target: 傳回代表目前物件的字串。

trans-unit.source: A string that represents the current object.
trans-unit.target: 表示目前物件的字串。
